imageManagement

Class RGBPixelImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • imageManagement.PixelImage
      • imageManagement.RGBPixelImage

  • public class RGBPixelImage
extends PixelImage
    Represents a type of RGB image. You should not need to modify it.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RGBPixelImage(java.io.File file)
      Constructs an RGB image of the given file.
      RGBPixelImage(int width, int height)
      Constructs an "empty" RGB Pixel image with the given height and width.

      Sets a pixlet at a particular location and type.
